title: Agile Requirements Foundations
description: The Agile Requirements Foundations course on LinkedIn Learning, taught by Angela Wick, focuses on equipping business analysts (BAs) with the necessary mindset and techniques for effective requirements analysis in agile projects. The course emphasizes the importance of adapting to the ever-changing needs of customers and teaches various methodologies and concepts that are pivotal for BAs in an agile environment.

title: Introduction to Career Skills in Data Analytics
description: The Introduction to Career Skills in Data Analytics course on LinkedIn Learning, taught by Robin Hunt, is designed for those looking to embark on a career as a data analyst, even if they lack a technical background. The course provides a comprehensive overview of the data analyst role, covering essential skills in business intelligence, data-driven decision-making, and various data collection methods.

title: Fundamentals of Data Security
description: The Fundamentals of Data Security course offered by Eskills Academy is designed to provide a solid foundation in cybersecurity, specifically focusing on data security principles. The course consists of four video tutorials, guiding students through essential concepts and methodologies necessary for ensuring the information security of an organization.
